objects.description: [BLUELIGHT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0657) has captured a screenshot of the display every 30 seconds for the first 5 minutes after initiating a C2 loop, and then once every five minutes thereafter.(Citation: Volexity InkySquid BLUELIGHT August 2021)

external_references.description: Cash, D., Grunzweig, J., Meltzer, M., Adair, S., Lancaster, T. (2021, August 17). North Korean APT InkySquid Infects Victims Using Browser Exploits. Retrieved September 30, 2021.
